com.buession.redis.serializer

类 AbstractSerializer<T extends com.buession.core.serializer.Serializer>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.buession.redis.serializer.AbstractSerializer<T>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Serializer
    直接已知子类:

extends Object
implements Serializer
